Title: Raymond Jr / Sr High School: Hire an actual foreign language teacher and refrain from using an online program.
Overview: At my school in Raymond Washington we are taught foreign language by means of an online program known as "Apex Learning". However many students agree that a human being should be teaching the class. For me at least learning a foreign language on a program has proven itself to be quite difficult. Machines can never replace human beings as teachers. Since this is an online program students have a better chance of cheating and getting away with it than they would if there was a human teaching the class. If a student is having a hard time understanding a subject a teacher may better explain to the student what they are not understanding. With a program you're stuck with what you get. Please sign my petition so that we (the students) may have a higher value of foreign language education.
Letter Body: Thank you very much for helping me reach one step further into getting a foreign language teacher for my school. It really means a lot that you are helping the students and I. If there is something you'd like me to aide you in  don't hesitate to tell me what it is.
